name: Close Call 3
desc: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.
inherit: Cannot use: ArmoredCavalryFlyingRed BowRed DaggerRed TomeRed BreathRed BeastBlue BowBlue DaggerBlue TomeBlue BreathBlue BeastGreen BowGreen DaggerGreen TomeGreen BreathGreen BeastColorless BowColorless DaggerColorless TomeColorless StaffColorless BreathColorless Beast
